alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Decatur (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 10:49PM CDT until June 06 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Benton County in west Tennessee... Eastern Carroll County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Decatur County in west Tennessee... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1049 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Huntingdon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Huntingdon, Camden, Bruceton, Hollow Rock, Clarksburg, Westport, Hillard, Dollar, Jeannette, I-40 Near The Tennessee River, Scott Hill, Holladay, Leach, Sugar Tree, Tate, Garretsburg, Palmer Shelter, Yuma, Cozette and Buena Vista. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Memphis.
